creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Unlock your ride and your city with Lime, the #1 electric scooter and bike sharing app. Our micro-mobility solutions including dock free rental bikes, e-assist bikes, and electric scooters are available anytime to get you across town or across campus. Simply tap to find a ride near you, scan the code to unlock it and go!

With Lime, you’ll never have to worry about traffic or finding a parking station, and you can leave your ride safely at your destination for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or a ride share. Have fun, connect with your community and get where you’re going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!

Download the app and get started today!

How Lime works:

- Open the app to find a nearby Lime-S (electric scooter), Lime-E (e-assist bike), LimeBike on the map
- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID
- Take a fun, healthy and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you’ve arrived, park and lock your ride safely out of the way of foot traffic

Use Lime for:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- When you want to explore your urban city
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!

Lime is currently available in 50+ cities, including but not limited to:
- San Francisco Bay Area
- San Diego
- Los Angeles
- Washington DC
- Denver
- Miami
- Charlotte
- Austin

Want Lime in your city? Let us know by voting on our website!

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Unlock your ride and your city with Lime, the #1 electric scooter and bike sharing app. Our micro-mobility solutions including dock free rental bikes, e-assist bikes, and electric scooters are available anytime to get you across town or across campus. Simply tap to find a ride near you, scan the code to unlock it and go!

With Lime, you’ll never have to worry about traffic or finding a parking station, and you can leave your ride safely at your destination for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or a ride share. Have fun, connect with your community and get where you’re going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!

Download the app and get started today!

How Lime works:

- Open the app to find a nearby Lime-S (electric scooter), Lime-E (e-assist bike), LimeBike on the map
- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID
- Take a fun, healthy and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you’ve arrived, park and lock your ride safely out of the way of foot traffic

Use Lime for:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- When you want to explore your urban city
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!

Lime is currently available in 50+ cities, including but not limited to:
- San Francisco Bay Area
- San Diego
- Los Angeles
- Washington DC
- Denver
- Miami
- Charlotte
- Austin

Want Lime in your city? Let us know by voting on our website!

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lime - Your Ride Anytime

Unlock your ride and your city with Lime, the #1 electric scooter and bike sharing app. Ride smarter, faster, and enjoy every second while riding the super-fun e-scooters & electric bikes.
Our micro-mobility solutions including dock free rental bikes, e-assist bikes, and electric scooters are available anytime to get you across town or campus.
SIMPLEST WAY TO A RIDE:🛴🛵
- tap to find a ride near you
- scan the code to unlock it
- and go, delight in your ride!


Join 50+ million users from around the world who have already used Lime for easy & reliable bike & scooter rentals.
⚡️YOUR FAVORITE TIME SAVER
Nobody likes getting stuck in traffic or traveling in closed spaces such as busses, metro, tramps that increase the exposure to potential contamination in these trying times.
With Lime, you’ll never have to worry about traffic, finding a parking station, or having anxiety when traveling in crowded busses or metros. Avoid the rush-hours, long-lines, and feel the fresh air in your chest with Lime e-scooters and e-bikes.
Once you get to your destination, you can leave your ride safely for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or rideshare. Plus, you get to your destination without having to ride in closed spaces, and with other people.
Have fun, connect with your community, and get where you’re going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!

Download the bike & scooter app and get your scooter or bike rental today!

ℹ️HOW LIME WORKS:
- Open the app to find a nearby Lime-S (electric scooter), Lime-E (e-assist bike), LimeBike bicycle on the map
- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID
- Take a fun, healthy, and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you’ve arrived, park and lock your ride safely out of the way of foot traffic

✅USE LIME FOR:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- When you want to explore your urban city
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!
🌎A TRAVELER’S FAVORITE
Lime’s electric scooters & e-bikes have been largely enjoyed by tourists to explore cities in their true color, spirit, and vibrance. So, next time you visit a city where Lime is available, rent an e-scooter or bike and experience the streets, locals, local places, and attractions in their true spirit.


⭐️QUALITY & FAST TRANSPORTATION
All Lime e-scooters and bikes are regularly serviced and offer standard speed maximums and long ranges. That’s why you can be sure that when you ride with Lime, you ride with safe, powerful, comfortable, and reliable electric scooters and bikes.

Before your next transportation mess, or frustration with unprofessional scooter rental apps that don’t work, download Lime and enjoy the easiest and most reliable rent scooter & e bike rental app.

👉 Get Lime – the most downloaded bike and e-scooters rental app!

==

With Lime, you’ll never have to worry about traffic, finding a parking station, or having anxiety when traveling in crowded busses or metros. Avoid the rush-hours, long-lines, and feel the fresh air in your chest with Lime e-scooters and e-bikes.

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Rethink your ride in your city with Lime! Lime operates in over 100 cities globally and offers various shared electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city. Our micro-mobility solutions are available 24/7 to get you across town. Simply tap to find a ride near you, scan the code to unlock it and go!
With Lime, you don’t have to worry about traffic, and you can park your ride securely at your destination. Per minute, Lime is way cheaper than a normal taxi ride! Have fun, connect with your community and get where you're going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!
Download the app and get started today!
We’re on a mission for cleaner, more livable cities.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change, and make cities healthier and more livable, we need to revolutionize urban transportation toward a shared, electric, and carbon free future. Electric shared micromobility can be among the most sustainable modes in the world, with the potential to replace all car trips under 5 miles. That’s our goal.
Lime is driving the transformation to create people-first cities that are healthier, more equitable, and carbon free.

How Lime works:
- Open the app to find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map and view pricing (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)
-Create an account, accept our terms and conditions (https://www.li.me/user-agreement/), Privacy Notice (https://www.li.me/privacy) and enter a valid payment method
- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID code
- Take a fun, carbon-free and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you've arrived, park and lock your ride safely in designated areas
Use Lime for:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- Exploring your urban city or town
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!
Lime is currently available in 100+ cities, including but not limited to:
Paris
London
Stockholm
Oslo
Copenhagen
Rome
Madrid
Miami
Washington DC
Seoul
Melbourne
Sydney
Brisbane
Rio de Janeiro
Santiago

- Lime vehicles are also available on the Uber app in select cities.
- You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions: https://www.li.me/user-agreement/.

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Rethink your ride in your city with Lime! Lime operates in over 100 cities globally and offers various shared electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city. Our micro-mobility solutions are available 24/7 to get you across town. Simply tap to find a ride near you, scan the code to unlock it and go!
With Lime, you don’t have to worry about traffic, and you can park your ride securely at your destination. Per minute, Lime is way cheaper than a normal taxi ride! Have fun, connect with your community and get where you're going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!
Download the app and get started today!
We’re on a mission for cleaner, more livable cities.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change, and make cities healthier and more livable, we need to revolutionize urban transportation toward a shared, electric, and carbon free future. Electric shared micromobility can be among the most sustainable modes in the world, with the potential to replace all car trips under 5 miles. That’s our goal.
Lime is driving the transformation to create people-first cities that are healthier, more equitable, and carbon free.

How Lime works:
- Open the app to find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map and view pricing (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)
-Create an account, accept our terms and conditions (https://www.li.me/user-agreement/), Privacy Notice (https://www.li.me/privacy) and enter a valid payment method
- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID code
- Take a fun, carbon-free and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you've arrived, park and lock your ride safely in designated areas
Use Lime for:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- Exploring your urban city or town
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!
Lime is currently available in 100+ cities, including but not limited to:
Paris
London
Stockholm
Oslo
Copenhagen
Rome
Madrid
Miami
Washington DC
Seoul
Melbourne
Sydney
Brisbane
Rio de Janeiro
Santiago

- Lime vehicles are also available on the Uber app in select cities.
- You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions: https://www.li.me/user-agreement/.

⚡️YOUR FAVORITE TIME SAVER
Nobody likes getting stuck in traffic or traveling in closed spaces such as busses, metro, tramps that increase the exposure to potential contamination in these trying times.
With Lime, you’ll never have to worry about traffic, finding a parking station, or having anxiety when traveling in crowded busses or metros. Avoid the rush-hours, long-lines, and feel the fresh air in your chest with Lime e-scooters and e-bikes.
Once you get to your destination, you can leave your ride safely for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or rideshare. Plus, you get to your destination without having to ride in closed spaces, and with other people.
Have fun, connect with your community, and get where you’re going in style. Lime is your ride anytime!

Download the bike & scooter app and get your scooter or bike rental today!

ℹ️HOW LIME WORKS:

- Unlock your ride by scanning the QR code or entering the ID
- Take a fun, healthy, and affordable ride to your destination
- Once you’ve arrived, park and lock your ride safely out of the way of foot traffic

✅USE LIME FOR:
- Your morning/evening commute
- Rides with friends
- Rides to/from public transit stations
- Rides to/from classes
- Travel and tourist groups
- Date nights
- When you want to explore your urban city
- Anytime you want a fun, quick, convenient ride across town!

⭐️QUALITY & FAST TRANSPORTATION

Before your next transportation mess, or frustration with unprofessional scooter rental apps that don’t work, download Lime and enjoy the easiest and most reliable rent scooter & e bike rental app.

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lime is your ideal carbon-free option for any trip, any time, anywhere.

Available in more than 150 cities globally, Lime is a leading provider of electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Whether you’re commuting to work, running errands, riding with friends, or exploring a new city, Lime has an electric vehicle to meet any need, preference or comfort level.

HOW IT WORKS
Download the app, create an account, accept our User Agreement, acknowledge you’ve read our Privacy Notice, and add a valid payment method
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your location and supply)
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or, if available in your city, tapping a button on the app
RIDE GREEN
Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lime is your ideal carbon-free option for any trip, any time, anywhere.

Available in more than 150 cities globally, Lime is a leading provider of electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Whether you’re commuting to work, running errands, riding with friends, or exploring a new city, Lime has an electric vehicle to meet any need, preference or comfort level.

HOW IT WORKS
• Download the app, create an account, accept our User Agreement, acknowledge you’ve read our Privacy Notice, and add a valid payment method
• Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your location and supply)
• Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or, if available in your city, tapping a button on the app

RIDE GREEN
Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

Lime is your ideal carbon-free option for any trip, any time, anywhere.

Available in more than 150 cities globally, Lime is a leading provider of electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Whether you’re commuting to work, running errands, riding with friends, or exploring a new city, Lime has an electric vehicle to meet any need, preference or comfort level.

HOW IT WORKS
• Download the app, create an account, accept our User Agreement, acknowledge you’ve read our Privacy Notice, and add a valid payment method
• Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your location and supply)
• Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or, if available in your city, tapping a button on the app

RIDE GREEN
Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.
descriptionShort: Electric Scooter & Bike Share App

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We regularly update the app to make your rider experience even better.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps us running :-)

Question or suggestions? Tap Help in the Lime app!

Whether you’re commuting to work, running errands, riding with friends, or exploring a new city, Lime has an electric vehicle to meet any need, preference or comfort level.

HOW IT WORKS
• Download the app, create an account, accept our User Agreement, acknowledge you’ve read our Privacy Notice, and add a valid payment method
• Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your location and supply)
• Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or, if available in your city, tapping a button on the app

RIDE GREEN
Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

title: Lime - Your Ride Anytime

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lime is your ideal carbon-free option for any trip, any time, anywhere.

Available in more than 150 cities globally, Lime is a leading provider of electric vehicles, including scooters, bikes and mopeds. Whether you’re commuting to work, running errands, riding with friends, or exploring a new city, Lime has an electric vehicle to meet any need, preference or comfort level.

HOW IT WORKS
• Download the app, create an account, accept our User Agreement, acknowledge you’ve read our Privacy Notice, and add a valid payment method
• Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your location and supply)
• Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or, if available in your city, tapping a button on the app

RIDE GREEN
Our mission is to provide for a carbon-free future, creating cleaner, more livable cities that put people first.
Transportation is one of the world’s largest sources of climate-disrupting greenhouse gas emissions, contributing approximately 25% of global CO2. To address climate change and make cities healthier and more livable, we aim to revolutionize urban transportation, creating a shared, electric, and carbon-free future. Electric, shared micromobility is among the most sustainable ways to get around, with the potential to replace all short car trips.

RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

• Ride scooters and bikes in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
• Wear a helmet when you ride
• Park clear of walkways, driveways, and access ramps

Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our user agreement: https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Please check the Lime app for details of the services and vehicles offered in your city.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for riding with Lime! We update our app regularly to make your experience better. Every update includes performance and reliability improvements. When new features are released, we’ll highlight them for you in the app. #RideGreen

Love Lime? Rate us! Your feedback is important to us. If you have questions or suggestions, tap Help in the app.

Question or suggestions? Tap Help in the Lime app!

title: Lime - #RideGreen

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter!

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/

Step 2
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.
descriptionShort: Go car-free with the world’s largest electric vehicle company

title: Lime - #RideGreen

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter!

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/

Step 2
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/

Step 2
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/

Step 2
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

creator: Neutron Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter!

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/

Step 2
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more
